description: The Samsung Galaxy S24 FE 5G is now available at a significantly reduced price on Amazon India. The base variant with 8GB RAM and 128GB storage is listed at Rs. 35,655 instead of its original launch price of Rs. 59,999. In contrast, the Samsung India website continues to list the phone at its full launch price.
title: Samsung Galaxy S24 FE Gets a Price Cut on Amazon: See Offer

description: iPhone 16 Pro Max and iPhone 16 Pro are the crown jewels in Apple’s latest smartphone lineup. While these devices usually command a premium price, they can be purchased at reduced rates. Flipkart has rolled out offers on both handsets for a limited time, enabling buyers to take advantage of discounts, bank offers, and no-cost EMI options.
title: iPhone 16 Pro, iPhone 16 Pro Max Available at Discounted Prices on Flipkart: See Offers

description: Apple’s Dynamic Island, which currently hides its Face ID biometric authentication system, is said to get a minor upgrade this year, making it a wee bit smaller. A tipster now claims that things will get even smaller in the coming year, with Apple’s iPhone 18 Pro and 18 Pro Max getting a visible hole-punch camera with the Face ID system hidden under the display.
title: iPhone 18 Pro Series Tipped to Get Hole-Punch Selfie Camera, Hidden Face ID System

description: Samsung itself has accidentally confirmed the existence of the Galaxy Buds Core. The listing of Galaxy Buds Core on the company website reveals its design and specifications
title: Samsung Galaxy Buds Core Listed on Company Site; Design, Specifications Revealed

description: Gigabyte Aorus Master 16 has been launched in India. The AI PC is powered by the Intel Core Ultra 9 chipset and up to Nvidia GeForce RTX 5080 GPU based on the Blackwell architecture. Gigabyte has equipped the gaming laptop with a 16-inch OLED screen which supports a 240Hz refresh rate. It features voice-assisted controls for adjusting audio, cooling, and performance, powered by the GiMate AI agent.
title: Gigabyte Aorus Master 16 AI PC With Intel Core Ultra 9 Chip, Up to GeForce RTX 5080 GPU Launched in India

description: Google’s fight against a record EUR 4.1 billion ($4.7 billion) European Union antitrust fine has suffered a blow. Advocate General Juliane Kokott of the EU’s Court of Justice said in a non-binding opinion that Google’s appeal should fail because the legal arguments put forward by the US tech giant fell short.
title: Google Suffers Setback in Fight Over EU’s EUR 4.1 Billion Fine

description: Oppo Reno 14 5G series with MediaTek Dimensity chipsets was launched in China last month. Now, Oppo has disclosed the launch date of the Oppo Reno 14 5G and Reno 14 Pro 5G in Malaysia. The lineup is confirmed to launch in Indian market soon. It will go on sale via Amazon and Flipkart.
title: Oppo Reno 14 5G Series Global Launch Date Announced; Amazon, Flipkart Tease Online Availability in India

description: Vivo X Fold 5 is reportedly making its way to the Indian market soon. The launch date is yet to be officially confirmed by the Chinese company, but according to a fresh leak, the smartphone ​will launch in India between July 10 and July 15. The foldable is confirmed to offer a slim design, a 6,000mAh battery, and a Zeiss backed triple rear camera setup.
title: Vivo X Fold 5 India Launch Reportedly Set for Mid-July

description: In a letter to Perplexity Chief Executive Aravind Srinivas seen by the FT, BBC said it may seek an injunction unless the AI firm stops scraping its content, deletes existing copies used to train its AI systems, and submits "a proposal for financial compensation" for the alleged misuse of its intellectual property.
title: BBC Said to Have Threatened Legal Action Against AI Start-up Perplexity Over Content Scraping

description: The Nothing Headphone 1 leaked images reveal a transparent design with cassette tape-inspired earcups, several buttons, and cushioned headband and earcups. The headphones, inscribed with their name, are seen in black and white colour options. Previous leaks suggest a third grey colourway as well. A USB Type-C port and a 3.5mm jack are visible at the bottom of one of the earcups.
title: Nothing Headphone 1 Renders and Live Images Leak Ahead of July 1 Launch; Shows Unique Design

description: US President Donald Trump on Thursday extended to September 17 a deadline for China-based ByteDance to divest the US assets of short-video app TikTok. Trump signed an executive order pushing back Thursday's deadline for 90 days, a step he had previously signaled.
title: Trump Extends Deadline for US TikTok Sale to September

description: Cybersecurity researchers have discovered a “mysterious database” comprising a staggering 16 billion login credentials, in what is being called one of the biggest data breaches in history. According to a report, it impacted some of the world’s biggest technology companies including Apple, Facebook, and Google, along with government portals from multiple countries. The data breach gave threat actors brief but unprecedented access to personal credentials, posing risk of account takeover, identity theft, and phishing attacks.
title: 16 Billion Login Credentials Leaked in Massive Data Breach Impacting Apple, Google and More

description: Adobe has launched yet another app for the iPhone, building upon its recent releases of Firefly and Photoshop on the App Store. The US-based company has introduced Project Indigo, a dedicated camera app developed by Adobe Labs which leverages computational photography to capture up to 32 frames and combine them into a single photo. It uses artificial intelligence (AI) to store images in both standard dynamic range (SDR) and high dynamic range (HDR).
title: Adobe Launches Project Indigo, a Camera App for iPhone With Full Manual Controls

description: Nintendo Switch 2 launched on June 5 and set the record for the biggest-ever console launch in the US. Sales of third-party games released on the console, however, have reportedly disappointed, with one publisher saying the numbers were below its lowest estimates.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Third-Party Game Sales Reportedly 'Very Low' Despite Console's Record Launch

description: Oppo Find X8 Pro was launched in India in November last year in India alongside the Find X8. Now, the Chinese tech brand seems to be gearing up to introduce new Find X9 series smartphones. Ahead of the official launch, a Chinese tipster has suggested the camera details of the phone. The Oppo Find X9 Pro is tipped to come with a triple rear camera unit.
title: Oppo Find X9 Pro Camera Details Leaked; Said to Feature Samsung ISOCELL HP5 Sensor

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE is expected to hit markets later this year with upgrades over the Galaxy S24 FE. Ahead of the launch, a new leak shows off its design. The phone is expected to feature a similar design as the Galaxy S24 FE with vertical rear cameras. However, the Galaxy S25 FE may launch with a 6.7-inch display and a 12-megapixel selfie camera.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE Renders Leak Online, Suggesting Familiar Design With Thinner Bezels

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 leaked renders show that handset will have a larger cover display compared to the 3.4-inch folder-like screen on the preceding Galaxy Z Flip 6. The clamshell foldable could come in 256GB and 512GB storage variants. The Galaxy Z Flip 7 is expected to get an overclocked Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy chipset or an Exynos 2500 SoC.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 Leaked Renders Suggest Edge-to-Edge Cover Display

description: Vivo Y400 Pro 5G was unveiled in India on Friday with a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 chipset and a 5,500mAh battery with 90W fast charging support. The handset gets a 50-megapixel dual rear camera unit, a 32-megapixel selfie shooter, and an IP65-rated build. The Vivo Y400 Pro measures 7.49mm in thickness and is claimed to be the slimmest handset in its segment with a 3D curved display.
title: Vivo Y400 Pro 5G With 50-Megapixel Rear Camera, 5,500mAh Battery Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: YouTube will soon integrate Google’s latest artificial intelligence (AI)-powered video generation model, CEO Neal Mohan announced at the Cannes Lions International Festival of Creativity 2025 on Wednesday. It will support improved video generation capabilities powered by the Mountain View-based tech giant’s recently released Veo 3 video generation AI model. It is said to enable users to create AI-generated backgrounds and video clips for Shorts, delivering improved video quality alongside more upgrades.
title: YouTube Shorts to Bring Google’s Veo 3 Video Generation Model With Audio Support 'This Summer'

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 is rumoured to go official on July 9 alongside the Galaxy Z Flip 7 at the Galaxy Unpacked event. Ahead of its anticipated debut, alleged official-looking renders of the purported handset have surfaced online. The renders hint at the change in its thickness compared to the Galaxy Z Fold 6, as well as two of the possible colourways. Meanwhile, a retailer has leaked the possible storage options of Samsung’s seventh generation foldable smartphones.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Leaked Renders Hint at Design Changes; Storage Options Tipped
